title: In applications shared in Kid's Corner, allow all tasks in the application to function
body: It is up to the parents what apps they decide to share from the Main Phone to Kids Corner, regardless of the capabilities of the app. Currently if you want to use a task that is regularly blocked in Kid's Corner, like Phone Call Task - you are displayed a message that indicates that you are not able to use that functionality. My use case, as a parent, is that I really don’t want to give the kids a full functioning smart phone, I don’t want them dialing random people, I'd like to keep them in Kid's Corner. I’d like to give them the ability to “Call Home”, “Call Mom”, etc. where I can control who they call, that’s why I wanted to create and share an application in Kid's Corner to allow me to accomplish this. This feature, as well as the feature here http://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-dev-platform/suggestions/3326985-no-pin-option-for-kids-corner would work in conjunction with one another to accomplish this use case.
